question_text: The dynamic response amplitude |𝐻(𝜔)| of a single degree of freedom system  subjected to support motion is given by the following expression.  |𝐻(𝜔)| = √ 1 + 4 𝜁2 ( 𝜔 𝜔𝑛) 2 [1 −( 𝜔 𝜔𝑛) 2 ] 2 + 4 𝜁2 ( 𝜔 𝜔𝑛) 2     |𝐻(𝜔)| increases with an increase in damping ratio (𝜁) if the excitation            frequency (𝜔) is _________ the natural frequency (𝜔𝑛) of the system.
The beam PQRS is subjected to a vertical point load of 10 kN at point S as shown  in the figure.   The magnitude of fixed end moment at P is _______ kN-m.
